casebody.data:
No. 10-772. City of Hazleton, Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Pedro Lozano, et al. 563 U.S. 1030, 131 S. Ct. 2958,

180 L. Ed. 2d 243,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4259. June 6, 2011.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit for further consideration in light of Chamber of Commerce of United States of America v. Whiting, 563 U.S. 582, 131 S. Ct. 1968, 179 L. Ed. 2d 1031 (2011).

Same case below, 620 F.3d 170.
